definitions.text: (chemistry) a substance consisting of two or more substances mixed together (not in fixed proportions and not with chemical bonding)
any foodstuff made by combining different ingredients
examples: he volunteered to taste her latest concoction
he drank a mixture of beer and lemonade

definitions.text: a collection containing a variety of sorts of things
examples: a great assortment of cars was on display
he had a variety of disorders

definitions.text: an event that combines things in a mixture

examples: paste made by a mix of flour and water
the mixing of sound channels in the recording studio
